languages.text: {n}Ульфар печально улыбается.{/n} "Как я хотел, чтобы предчувствие меня обмануло, и сие погребальное питье прокисло, не будучи испробованным".
{n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар печально улыбается.{/n} "Как я хотел, чтобы предчувствие меня обмануло, и сие погребальное питье прокисло, не будучи испробованным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地笑了起来。{/n}“我的酒会变酸，无人品尝。我多么希望这样的预言是个谎言。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地笑了起来。{/n}“我的酒会变酸，无人品尝。我多么希望这样的预言是个谎言。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは哀しげに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「俺の予感が嘘だったら、献杯も、飲んだことないくらい酸味が強けりゃよかったんだが」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは哀しげに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「俺の予感が嘘だったら、献杯も、飲んだことないくらい酸味が強けりゃよかったんだが」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Me hubiera gustado que el presagio fuera falso y que esta bebida se agriara sin ser degustada».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Me hubiera gustado que el presagio fuera falso y que esta bebida se agriara sin ser degustada».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar esquisse un sourire triste.{/n} « J'aurais tant aimé que mon présage soit mensonger et que ma libation se perde sans jamais être goûtée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar esquisse un sourire triste.{/n} « J'aurais tant aimé que mon présage soit mensonger et que ma libation se perde sans jamais être goûtée. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar lächelt traurig.{/n} "Ich wünschte, mein Omen würde sich als Lüge entpuppen, und mein Getränk würde sauer, ohne jemals probiert zu werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar lächelt traurig.{/n} "Ich wünschte, mein Omen würde sich als Lüge entpuppen, und mein Getränk würde sauer, ohne jemals probiert zu werden."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar acıyla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Alametimin yalan olmasını ve şarabımın tadılmadan ekşimesini dilerdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar smiles sadly.{/n} "How I wished that my omen would prove a lie, and that my libation would sour without ever being tasted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar acıyla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Alametimin yalan olmasını ve şarabımın tadılmadan ekşimesini dilerdim."
